item.title: Teaching
item.description: Prepared Courses Foundations of Large Language Models Description: This graduate-level course provides a solid foundation in the theory and practice of large language models, such as GPT-4. Students will learn about the architecture, training methodologies, and applications of these models for social science research, as well as their ethical implications and future research directions. Keywords: large language models, GPT-4, machine learning, NLP, AI Syllabus Introduction to Political Analysis Description: This first-year course provides students with a comprehensive understanding of political analysis, including the study of political systems, ideologies, institutions, and behaviors.
